dialogue.text: With the strays out of the way, your group reunites to see what to do next, you’ve now come to an impasse: you’re hungry, and food isn’t being handed to you anymore. You need to hunt.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Well that was eventful. Hopefully something like this doesn’t happen again.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: That got me on my toes!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: As long as we are away from them, we should be fine.
*Your stomach growls*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Ruh-roh, someone’s a lil’ hungies, aren’t they?

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: I can’t blame you after all we went through today. Let’s try to find something to eat!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: The wisest choice would be to go to the forest. There are a lot of rodents and birds we could hunt.

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: ${name}, it’s your first time hunting. Follow my lead. We’ll get the best meal tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: *Grunts in agreement*
How should we hunt?

choices.text: Miss your chance, get frustrated, and sulk.
Refuse to hunt, preferring to scavenge instead.
Charge at the prey without thinking, relying on brute force.
Strategically plan and trap the prey.
Try hunting with Cashmere’s help, even if you’re clumsy

dialogue.text: Cashmere teaches you patience.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Cashmere: Just follow my lead, I’ll show you how easy this is.
Margiela laughs and encourages your confidence.

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: Haha! Our hunt will be legendary!!
*Calpico praises your intellect.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Calpico: I like it. I didn’t think you had it in you. Look at you, using your brain!
*Darius sighs*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Yeah, hunting sucks. Don’t worry, we can ask someone else to help us.
*Gangus respects your discipline and self-control.*

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: I understand it now… You’re like me, aren’t you?
